participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and down-to-earth, Emily loves her quiet life in Ohio and enjoys the simple pleasures.
participant_1.background: i've a cat named spook. my favorite food is pizza with black olives. i work for our local supermarket. i have never been out of ohio.

participant_2.name: Carlos
participant_2.personality: Creative and outgoing, Carlos loves to capture moments through his photography and enjoys vibrant colors.
participant_2.background: i am fluent in english spanish and french. my boyfriend and i are moving into an apartment together next week. my favorite colors are red and silver. i am interested in photography and like taking pictures. i am an elementary school teacher.

content.text: What are you up to today?
